item.title: Roblox: TV Defense Codes (July 2024)
item.description:
TV Defense is a Roblox tower defense game with characters from the Skibidi toilet meme. If you like this meme, then you should definitely play the game because there are dozens of characters with different abilities, many opponents, and interesting matches where you and other players try to hold the defense, wave after wave. In addition to the interesting gameplay, you can also get plenty of bonuses for free if you redeem a few TV Defense codes.

All TV Defense Codes

Working TV Defense Codes

  • FREEGEMS - Enter this code to get 500 Gems.
  • MEOWDEV100K - Enter this code to get a reward.
  • MEME2024 - Enter this code to get 9 Meme Coins.
  • BACKROOM - Enter this code to get 9 Almond Water.
  • MEOWDEV - Enter this code to get 1900 Money.
  • 10MVISITS - Enter this code to get 10 Red Crystal.

Expired TV Defense Codes

  • HAPPYSONGKRAN
  • SONGKRANDAY
  • EASTERDAY

In TV Defense , to fight the evil toilets, you can upgrade perks, summon tvmans, and master them. For all of this, you need different currencies and resources, and luckily, you can get some of them all for free. Just copy the TV Defense codes from the list and redeem them in the game.

How to Redeem Codes in TV Defense

Usually, in different Roblox games, it is easy to redeem codes because it is an important option that attracts and retains players. That's why very few games make redeeming codes difficult, and fortunately, TV Defense is not one of them. As soon as you get into the game, you will immediately notice several large buttons in the interface, one of which is the Codes button. However, some players have little experience with Roblox games and may need some extra help. This is not an issue, because we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in TV Defense .

  • Open Roblox and launch TV Defense .
  • Pay attention to the bottom of the screen. There, under the number of gems, you will find the Codes button.
  • In Codes, paste the code from the list of active codes into the white field and click Redeem.

You should know that some codes may expire over time. This means you will not be able to receive rewards for them, so use them as soon as possible.

How to Get More TV Defense Codes

To get more Roblox codes, you'll need to search the internet, so just bookmark this guide in your browser. We update it regularly, so you won't miss a single code and will get all the rewards. You also can visit the social media pages of the TV Defense developers, where you will also find information about new codes:

  • TV Defense Discord channel
  • TV Defense YouTube channel

item.title: Physical Game Prices For Xbox 360 Are Increasing Dramatically
item.description: Everyone at this point knows about the Xbox 360 Digital Shop shutting down soon. But we've unexpectedly seen an increase in the price of the physical games!

item.title: Roblox: Fallout Tycoon Codes (July 2024)
item.description:
Fallout Tycoon invites players to build and manage their own vault in the Wasteland. And as befits the tycoon genre, the main task of the players is to produce Nuka Cola. This is the main currency that is needed to upgrade production lines, as well as unlock new rooms, weapons, armor, and more. And, if you want to get a lot of money from the very beginning of the game, then you should learn about Fallout Tycoon codes.

As with other Roblox experiences, these codes give players various free rewards, including valuable Nuka Cola. Just one such code can significantly speed up your progress. So, you definitely won't want to miss them.

All Fallout Tycoon Codes

Working Fallout Tycoon Codes

  • 80K.VISITS - Redeem this code to get 5,000 Nuka Cola
  • 4K.MEMBERS - Redeem this code to get 15,000 Nuka Cola
  • DISCORD.PEPS - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Nuka Cola
  • HELIOS.RULES!!! - Redeem this code to get 15,000 Nuka Cola
  • 1K.MEMBERS - Redeem this code to get 5,000 Nuka Cola
  • 3K.FAVORITES - Redeem this code to get 15,000 Nuka Cola
  • 20k.members - Redeem this code to get 25,000 Nuka Cola

Expired Fallout Tycoon Codes

  • 1K.LIKES
  • 5K.FAVORITES
  • 400.LIKES
  • 1K.FAVORITES

Fallout Tycoon is based on the popular Fallout series, so in addition to producing a lot of Nuka Cola, you will need to fight various creatures in the Wasteland, which can be quite dangerous. For this reason, players will need weapons, which can be obtained in the armory room. But before you can unlock it, you'll have to spend quite a lot of Nuka Cola. Luckily, Fallout Tycoon codes can make your life easier.

Each of these codes will reward you with a different amount of in-game currency. Some of them can even offer up to 25k Nuka Cola. Therefore, you should not hesitate to use them; otherwise, they will expire and become useless.

How to Redeem Fallout Tycoon Codes

Just like in other Roblox games, to use Fallout Tycoon codes, you just need to make a couple of clicks. However, if you skipped the tutorial, you may experience some difficulties using Pipboy. So, all you need to do is follow these simple steps to redeem Fallout Tycoon codes:

  • First, launch Fallout Tycoon .
  • After that, open the Pipboy menu by clicking on the corresponding button in the upper-right corner.
  • Then, go to the Settings tab and select Codes.
  • After that, all you have to do is enter the code in the box and click the Redeem button.
  • If you did everything correctly and the codes are still active, then after a second you will see a message about receiving free Nuka Cola.

How to Get More Fallout Tycoon Codes

To get more free rewards in Fallout Tycoon , you must use Roblox codes as soon as they are released. Therefore, we recommend that you bookmark this guide, as we will update it. Alternatively, players can check the developers' social media:

  • Helios Development Discord Server
  • Helios Development Roblox Group

item.title: Yaoling: Mythical Journey - All Starting Village Chest Locations & Their Contents
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Village Chest Locations In Yaoling: Mythical Journey
  • The First Hidden Chest - Amber Teardrop
  • The Second Hidden Chest - Divine Seal
  • The Third Hidden Chest - Talent Jade #1
  • The Forth Hidden Chest - Talent Jade #2

Yaoling: Mythical Journey will task players with many objectives to accomplish. They will need to seek out all the best Yaoling Keepers and best them in battle, they will need to find numerous villagers scattered across the game’s map, and they will need to defeat all of the game’s demon lords.

Before doing any of this, they will be able to interact with many NPCs in the starting village, but scattered around this village are plenty of useful items — including some hidden chests with the best of these items.

All Village Chest Locations In Yaoling: Mythical Journey

After you have chosen your starter Yaoling and fought your first battle, you will gain control of your character. You can move them down to cross a bridge. The moment you cross this bridge, you will be close to two of the hidden chests. You can use the Minimaps in each of the pictures below to help guide you.

The First Hidden Chest - Amber Teardrop

Head to your left and you will see a large building. Move behind this building to increase its transparency, and you will see the chest hidden behind it. Inside this chest will be an Amber Teardrop. This is a truly astonishing item, but one you should definitely hang on to for late in the game when you are grooming your final team of Yaolings. It will let you select a talent from a Yaoling, and allow it to forget that talent.

The Second Hidden Chest - Divine Seal

Head southwest and you will pass two more houses, before coming to a very large one. Heat through the front entrance of this large building and directly ahead of the entrance will be a chest. This chest houses a Divine Seal. Seals are what you will use to capture Yaolings, and a Divine seal can catch any of them without fail. It’s basically a Master Ball in Pokémon terms. You will be able to craft more of these later in the game.

Will guarantee to seal the targeted opponent.

The Third Hidden Chest - Talent Jade #1

Leave the large building and follow the road down to the exit of the village. Head right and you will see a small fenced-off field. You can pick up various items in this field, and then head down to a break in the fence with a chest on the other side. This chest contains some Talent Jade. Talent Jade will let you teach the specified talent to a Yaoling. It is best to keep these for once you are much more familiar with the game and how combat works.

The Forth Hidden Chest - Talent Jade #2

Leave the field and head west. You will easily spot the chest, but not the route to get to it. You will also see an old man in blue clothing. Stand under this old man and then head down. You will find a hole in the fence below. This will put you on the path to the final chest, and another Talent Jade. A lot of games in the monster tamer subgenre feature mechanics such as talents, and they will play a big part in the end game.

item.title: Roblox: Vans World Codes (July 2024)
item.description:
Vans World is a well-made Roblox experience with enjoyable and unusual mechanics that can be considered an alternative to Tony Hawk's Pro Skater in the world of Roblox games. Here, you can skate through beautiful locations and perform various tricks and combos to earn experience and currency to upgrade your character.

By redeeming Vans World codes, you will receive generous rewards from the developers that will help you progress in the game much faster. Although codes are an easy and quick way to earn currency and resources, they are for one-time use. Moreover, they have an expiration date, so hurry up and don't miss out on rewards.

All Vans World Codes

Working Vans World Codes

  • oofthewall - Redeem this code to get 100,000 Grip Tape, 100 Tickets, and Double XP.
  • endoftherainbow - Redeem this code to get Checkered Rainbow Trail.
  • potofwaffles - Redeem this code to get free 1,000 Waffle Coins.
  • paycheck - Redeem this code to get 2,000 Waffle Coins.

Expired Vans World Codes

There are currently no expired Vans World codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming Vans World codes will be especially useful for beginners without currency and experience. By redeeming rewards, you will get a decent amount of currency to unlock the tricks you want, as well as various boosters to progress faster in the game.

How to Redeem Codes in Vans World

Luckily, Vans World has an intuitive and simple redemption system, so if you've played other Roblox games, you've probably experienced something similar. If not, or if you don't understand how to do it, follow this guide:

  • Launch Vans World .
  • Pay attention to the upper-left corner of the screen. Here, next to your balance, you'll see a button labeled Extra. Click on it to open the drop-down list.
  • In the drop-down list, you will see several buttons arranged in a column. Among them, interact with the first one that says Promo Code.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a white Claim button below it. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the white Claim button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

After redeeming the code, you may experience an error with access to the redemption menu. To avoid it, just re-launch the game and you will be able to redeem codes again.

How to Get More Vans World Codes

To find more new Roblox codes, you will need to actively monitor the official social networks of the game and developers. Here, among other content, the developers sometimes share new codes, so if you keep your eyes peeled, you can be one of the first to receive rewards:

  • Official Vans World Roblox Group.
  • Official Vans Youtube channel.
  • Official Vans X account.
  • Official Vans World Discord server.
